title: TOKYO LAUNCHES ¥3.3 TRILLION TREASURY DISCOUNT BILL AUCTION ...

title: Crypto bank Anchorage Digital eyes $400M raise with IPO in sight: Report
snippet: Being the first federally chartered bank, Anchorage is looking to become a leading stablecoin issuer in 2026, with plans to double the size of its stablecoin team this year.

title: White House threatens to pull support for crypto bill after Coinbase standoff: Report
snippet: Coinbase withdrew support for the CLARITY Act, warning the draft would restrict DeFi, ban tokenized equities and eliminate stablecoin rewards.

title: DTCC 'Not Building Walled Gardens' for Tokenization, Says Digital Assets Head
snippet: The financial giant says it's open to interoperability

title: South Korea Tightens Crypto Access as Google Play Blocks Unregistered Exchanges
snippet: A new app store crackdown has landed in South Korea as lawmakers formalize a framework for tokenized securities.

title: Citrea USD (ctUSD): The Native Stablecoin for Bitcoin, Issued by MoonPay and Powered by M0
snippet: Citrea USD (ctUSD): The Native Stablecoin for Bitcoin, Issued by MoonPay and Powered by M0 a 1:1 U.S dollar-denominated stablecoin, fully backed by short-term U.S. Treasury bills and cash > ctUSD aims to set a native liquidity standard for the Bitcoin ecosystem and offer banking rails between on-cha

title: US lender Newrez to accept crypto holdings in mortgage approval
snippet: The new policy will allow borrowers to use Bitcoin, Ether, crypto ETFs and US dollar-backed stablecoins for asset verification and income estimates without liquidation.
